Avatar.name: Avatar
Avatar.description: Game character controlled by player, performs actions.

pos.description: Position of the avatar in grid.

size.description: Size of the avatar in grid units.

FlakAvatar.name: FlakAvatar
FlakAvatar.description: Horizontal avatar that shoots with SPACE key.

MissileAvatar.name: MissileAvatar
MissileAvatar.description: Oriented avatar that moves with speed 1.

MovingAvatar.name: MovingAvatar
MovingAvatar.description: A controllable avatar that can move in four directions.

NoisyRotatingFlippingAvatar.name: NoisyRotatingFlippingAvatar
NoisyRotatingFlippingAvatar.description: Avatar that rotates, flips, and emits noise

OngoingShootAvatar.name: OngoingShootAvatar
OngoingShootAvatar.description: Avatar that continuously shoots with movement.

OrientedAvatar.name: OrientedAvatar
OrientedAvatar.description: An avatar with a specific orientation and movement

RotatingAvatar.name: RotatingAvatar
RotatingAvatar.description: An avatar that rotates and moves.

RotatingFlippingAvatar.name: RotatingFlippingAvatar
RotatingFlippingAvatar.description: An avatar that rotates and flips based on input.

ShootAvatar.name: ShootAvatar
ShootAvatar.description: An oriented avatar that can shoot projectiles.

VerticalAvatar.name: VerticalAvatar
VerticalAvatar.description: Avatar moving vertically, only up and down.
